SELECT T.PRJT_CD prjtCd, T.TR_ACCT_CD trAcctCd, T.PRJT_END_YN prjtEndYn, T.TR_ACCT_NM trAcctNm, T.PRJT_NM prjtNm, T.CSTMR_NM cstmrNm, T.WORK_START_DT workStartDt, T.WORK_END_DT workEndDt, T.CNTRCT_CD cntrctCd, T.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD cntrctStatusCd, T.CNTRCT_STATUS_NM cntrctStatusNm, T.CHGR_NM chgrNm, T.HP_NO hpNo, (SELECT IFNULL(PRJT_END_YN, 'N') FROM T_PMS006 WHERE PRJT_CD=T.PRJT_CD) prjtEndYn FROM ( SELECT T1.PRJT_CD, T1.TR_ACCT_CD, T1.PRJT_END_YN, (SELECT TR_ACCT_NM FROM T_PMS001 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD) TR_ACCT_NM, T1.PRJT_NM, T1.CSTMR_NM, DATE_FORMAT(T1.WORK_START_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') WORK_START_DT, DATE_FORMAT(T1.WORK_END_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') WORK_END_DT, T2.CNTRCT_CD, T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '013' AND DTL_CD = T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD) CNTRCT_STATUS_NM, (SELECT CHGR_NM FROM T_PMS002 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD AND CHGR_SEQ_NO=T1.CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO) CHGR_NM, (SELECT HP_NO FROM T_PMS002 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD AND CHGR_SEQ_NO=T1.CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO) HP_NO FROM T_PMS006 T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PMS008 T2 ON T1.PRJT_CD=T2.PRJT_CD WHERE T1.PRJT_CFRM_YN='Y'
AND T1.PRJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchPrjtNm}, '%')
AND T1.CSTMR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchCstmrNm}, '%')
AND T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD IS NULL
AND T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD = #{srchCntrctStatusCd}
) T
WHERE 1=1
AND T.TR_ACCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTrAcctNm}, '%')
AND T.TR_ACCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTrAcctNm}, '%')
AND T.CHGR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchChgrNm}, '%')
ORDER BY T.TR_ACCT_NM ASC, T.WORK_START_DT ASC
ORDER BY T.WORK_START_DT DESC
LIMIT ${start}, ${pageSize}

SELECT /* selectCntSalesCntrctMgt */ COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT T1.PRJT_CD, T1.TR_ACCT_CD, T1.PRJT_END_YN, (SELECT TR_ACCT_NM FROM T_PMS001 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD) TR_ACCT_NM, T1.PRJT_NM, T1.CSTMR_NM, T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD, (SELECT CHGR_NM FROM T_PMS002 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD AND CHGR_SEQ_NO=T1.CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO) CHGR_NM FROM T_PMS006 T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PMS008 T2 ON T1.PRJT_CD=T2.PRJT_CD WHERE T1.PRJT_CFRM_YN='Y'
AND T1.PRJT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchPrjtNm}, '%')
AND T1.CSTMR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchCstmrNm}, '%')
AND T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD = #{srchCntrctStatusCd}
AND T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD IS NULL
AND T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD = #{srchCntrctStatusCd}
) T
WHERE 1=1
AND T.TR_ACCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTrAcctNm}, '%')
AND T.TR_ACCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTrAcctNm}, '%')
AND T.CHGR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchChgrNm}, '%')

SELECT T.PRJT_CD prjtCd, T.TR_ACCT_CD trAcctCd, T.PRJT_CFRM_DT prjtCfrmDt, T.PRJT_END_DT prjtEndDt, T.PRJT_END_YN prjtEndYn, T.TR_ACCT_NM trAcctNm, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(T.BIZ_RGT_NO, 1, 3), '-', SUBSTRING(T.BIZ_RGT_NO, 4, 2), '-', SUBSTRING(T.BIZ_RGT_NO, 6, 5)) bizRgtNo, T.PRJT_NM prjtNm, T.CSTMR_NM cstmrNm, T.WORK_START_DT workStartDt, T.WORK_END_DT workEndDt, T.CNTRCT_CD cntrctCd, T.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD cntrctStatusCd, T.CNTRCT_STATUS_NM cntrctStatusNm, T.SRVC_COST_SPPLY_AMT srvcCostSpplyAmt, T.SRVC_COST_TAX_AMT srvcCostTaxAmt, T.SRVC_COST_SPPLY_AMT+T.SRVC_COST_TAX_AMT srvcCostTotAmt, T.EXAM_NEED_YN examNeedYn, T.MEMO_DESC memoDesc, T.CHGR_NM chgrNm, T.HP_NO hpNo FROM ( SELECT T1.PRJT_CD, T1.TR_ACCT_CD, T1.PRJT_CFRM_DT, T1.PRJT_END_DT, T1.PRJT_END_YN, (SELECT TR_ACCT_NM FROM T_PMS001 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD) TR_ACCT_NM, (SELECT BIZ_RGT_NO FROM T_PMS001 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD) BIZ_RGT_NO, T1.PRJT_NM, T1.CSTMR_NM, DATE_FORMAT(T1.WORK_START_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') WORK_START_DT, DATE_FORMAT(T1.WORK_END_DT,'%Y.%m.%d') WORK_END_DT, T2.CNTRCT_CD, T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD, T2.SRVC_COST_SPPLY_AMT, T2.SRVC_COST_TAX_AMT, T2.EXAM_NEED_YN, T2.MEMO_DESC, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '013' AND DTL_CD = T2.CNTRCT_STATUS_CD) CNTRCT_STATUS_NM, (SELECT CHGR_NM FROM T_PMS002 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD AND CHGR_SEQ_NO=T1.CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO) CHGR_NM, (SELECT HP_NO FROM T_PMS002 WHERE TR_ACCT_CD=T1.TR_ACCT_CD AND CHGR_SEQ_NO=T1.CAL_CHGR_SEQ_NO) HP_NO FROM T_PMS006 T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PMS008 T2 ON T1.PRJT_CD=T2.PRJT_CD WHERE T1.PRJT_CD=#{prjtCd} ) T

SELECT CNTRCT_CD cntrctCd, DMND_SEQ_NO dmndSeqNo, DMND_DATE dmndDate, DMND_CD dmndCd, (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM T_PMS023 WHERE GRP_CD = '016' AND DTL_CD = DMND_CD) dmndCdNm, RMLRK_DESC rmlrkDesc, SUPPLY_AMT supplyAmt, TAX_AMT taxAmt, (SUPPLY_AMT+TAX_AMT) totAmt, EXAM_CFRM_YN examCfrmYn, DPST_YN dpstYn, MEMO_DESC memoDesc FROM T_PMS010 WHERE CNTRCT_CD = #{cntrctCd} ORDER BY DMND_DATE ASC

SELECT CONCAT('C', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'), 'S', LPAD(CAST(IFNULL(MAX(SUBSTR(CNTRCT_CD, 7, 3))+1, 1) AS CHAR), 3, '0')) maxCntrctCd FROM T_PMS008 WHERE SUBSTR(CNTRCT_CD, 2, 4) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PMS008 ( CNTRCT_CD, SRVC_COST_SPPLY_AMT, SRVC_COST_TAX_AMT, EXAM_NEED_YN, CNTRCT_STATUS_CD, MEMO_DESC, PRJT_CD, RGT_TM, RGTR_ID, UPT_TM, UPTR_ID ) VALUES ( #{cntrctCd}, #{srvcCostSpplyAmt}, #{srvcCostTaxAmt}, #{examNeedYn}, #{cntrctStatusCd}, #{memoDesc0}, #{prjtCd}, NOW(), #{rgtrId}, NOW(), #{uptrId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PMS008 SET SRVC_COST_SPPLY_AMT = #{srvcCostSpplyAmt}, SRVC_COST_TAX_AMT = #{srvcCostTaxAmt}, EXAM_NEED_YN = #{examNeedYn}, CNTRCT_STATUS_CD = #{cntrctStatusCd}, MEMO_DESC = #{memoDesc0}, PRJT_CD = #{prjtCd}, UPT_TM=NOW(), UPTR_ID=#{uptrId} WHERE CNTRCT_CD = #{cntrctCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PMS009 ( CNTRCT_CD, HST_SEQ_NO, SRVC_COST_SPPLY_AMT, SRVC_COST_TAX_AMT, EXAM_NEED_YN, CNTRCT_STATUS_CD, MEMO_DESC, PRJT_CD, RGT_TM, RGTR_ID ) VALUES ( #{cntrctCd}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(HST_SEQ_NO), 0)+1 FROM T_PMS009 ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE CNTRCT_CD=#{cntrctCd}), #{srvcCostSpplyAmt}, #{srvcCostTaxAmt}, #{examNeedYn}, #{cntrctStatusCd}, #{memoDesc0}, #{prjtCd}, NOW(), #{rgtrId} )

INSERT INTO T_PMS010 ( CNTRCT_CD, DMND_SEQ_NO, DMND_DATE, DMND_CD, RMLRK_DESC, SUPPLY_AMT, TAX_AMT, EXAM_CFRM_YN, MEMO_DESC, DPST_YN, RGT_TM, RGTR_ID, UPT_TM, UPTR_ID ) VALUES ( #{cntrctCd}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(DMND_SEQ_NO), 0)+1 FROM T_PMS010 ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE CNTRCT_CD=#{cntrctCd}), #{dmndDate}, #{dmndCd}, #{rmlrkDesc}, #{supplyAmt}, #{taxAmt}, #{examCfrmYn}, #{memoDesc}, 'N', NOW(), #{rgtrId}, NOW(), #{uptrId} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_PMS010 WHERE CNTRCT_CD = #{cntrctCd} AND DPST_YN = 'N'
